frontmatter.title: Keeping Server-Side Rendering Cool With React Hydration
frontmatter.description: The purpose of this article is to share some helpful things to keep in mind to render a seamless experience as a Server-Side Rendered (SSR) site transitions from a window-less (server) environment to a browser.
